attributes.review: Wow was the only thing that came out of my mouth when I got this app. I had got it to be up to date with all the news and I couldn‚Äôt believe what the app did to my phone. When I first opened the app I was met with a black screen. A few minutes later my phone just turned off. I was shocked I tried a few more times and it did the same thing. I have been a Trump supporter since day one and was hoping this app would work.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET DOES NOT WORK

attributes.review: This app took hours to download but I was ok with that for the most part but what really got me was when the app took up 90% of my storage and I had to delete almost everything on my phone. And to put the icing on the cake that app started to make my phone glitch and over heat!! It got so bad that my phone burnt my hand when I picked it up, like it was acid or something.
attributes.title: Don‚Äôt waist your time with this app

I hate it!‚Äù, ‚Äúwhen Mexico sends it‚Äôs people their not sending their best... their sending people with lots of problems! Their brining drugs, crime, and rapists‚Äù, and ‚Äúgrab her by the pu**y‚Äù. Like it was horrible. I can‚Äôt believe my phone would just start saying stuff like this. It‚Äôs so unprofessional! Like what kind of messed up person would say this? I got rid of it immediately. I don‚Äôt recommend anyone get this app. it‚Äôs full of hate and racist and sexist propaganda. If I could I would rate it zero stars

attributes.review: This is probably my first and LAST time I‚Äôm leaving a review on an app. I‚Äôm so disappointed on whoever made this app. Because of this app, I found thousands of viruses on my phone and one of those viruses was called ‚Äúcovid‚Äù as if things aren‚Äôt hard already. They could‚Äôve done a better job and tested the app instead of placing it in the apple store with everyone at risk of getting the covid virus. I am completely disappointed. Try to do better next time.

attributes.review: This app is the worst thing in ze world. It made weird noises that attracted insects into my home. It also killed the raccoon who keeps me company at night. Like what the heck not cool. Do not get this app it is not worth it, and deserves less than a one star.
